links.title: China adds US LNG to list of products for potential 25% import tariff
links.description: Houston - China rattled investors in the US LNG export sector when it said Friday it may impose 25% tariffs on American cargoes if President Donald Trump follows through on his threat to escalate the trade dispute with Beijing that he initiated.
